ygData.subject: Re: Lady Hawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Good, then I shouldn t have to babysit you when we re in the lab. Lady Hawk saw a problem with this bot watching her, she knew what her father had taught her

"Good, then I shouldn't have to babysit you when we're in the lab. 
Lady Hawk saw a problem with this bot watching her, she knew what her 
father had taught her but she was nowhere near being the great 
scientist she had claimed.  In fact this bot may even know more about 
what they were doing than she did. Lady Hawk decided to play with 
this for as long as she could. "This equipment is primative compared 
to what I'm used to, maybe you can be of use to me after all."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> She felt upset that this bot would treat her so rudely after just 
> meeting like this. But she wasn't going to let it bother her. 
> "To answer your question about my functions, I am a techo-organic 
> engineer and programmer.  You may find my services helpful." she 
said 
> in a cheerful voice.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lady Hawk sets the processor down and steps back. "Very well" she 
> was in his
> > base so she showed the courtesy due him.
> > 
> > His invitation for Squizzy to watch her experiments insulted her, 
> she knew
> > little of distrust or backstabbing, she only knew of her fathers 
> wishes and
> > how to fulfill them. "What is her function, will she be of 
> assistance or
> > will she be an annoyance?." She turned to return to her lab, "I 
> don't need a
> > clumsy, no talent bot getting in my way."
> > 
> > Lady Hawk chucled at Squizzys question about helping, "Youve 
> already helped
> > more than you know" She thought as she walked toward the 
lab. "Come 
> along
> > you wannabe Rat, I have work to do." She didn't want anyone 
hanging 
> over her
> > shoulder and she was intent on keeping it that way.
